name: Okta
description: From our inception in 2009 to joining forces with Auth0 in 2021, Okta is the leading independent Identity partner for organizations around the globe. We're relentlessly focused on Customer and Workforce Identity so that our customers can enable secure access and seamless experiences for their customers, employees, and partners. With flexibility and customer choice at our core, our solutions make it easy for everyone — from budding developers to leaders of the world’s largest organizations — to build and use their tech stack, their way. All because Okta works anywhere, on any device, with any technology.
features: Review the eligibility rules and learn how to enroll.
Save for every day needs, build your wealth, protect your income.
Base pay, Okta stock ownership, and bonus all combine to deliver competitive and valuable rewards.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: The World's Identity Company
ShortDescription: Okta gives you a neutral, powerful and extensible platform that puts identity at the heart of your stack. No matter what industry, use case, or level of support you need, we’ve got you covered.
enhanced_description: Okta is a leading independent Identity partner, established in 2009 and enhanced by its 2021 merger with Auth0. The platform is dedicated to Customer and Workforce Identity, enabling secure access and seamless experiences for organizations' customers, employees, and partners globally. Okta offers a neutral, powerful, and extensible platform designed to integrate identity at the core of any technology stack. Its solutions empower users, from budding developers to leaders of the world's largest organizations, to build and utilize their tech stack with flexibility and choice, accessible anywhere, on any device, with any technology.
